oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Xylazine prolongs the duration of action of inverted L blocks in steers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Varner, K.M.
Klein, S.
Keefer, M.
Dodam, J.R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The addition of xylazine to lidocaine has been shown to prolong lidocaineâ€™s duration of action when administered as a distal paravertebral block in cattle. This study aimed to determine if the addition of xylazine to lidocaine would prolong the duration of action of lidocaine when administered as an inverted L block.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; Vol. 58 No. 58 (2024): 2024 AABP Annual Conference Proceedings; 217
